PR TITLE FORMAT (Conventional Commits):

  fix: <description>          — Bug fix (patch release)
  feat: <description>         — New feature (minor release)
  fix!: / feat!: <description> — Breaking change (major release)
  chore: <description>        — Maintenance (no release)
  docs: <description>         — Documentation only
  refactor: <description>     — Code restructuring (no release)
  test: <description>         — Test changes (no release)
  ci: <description>           — CI/CD changes (no release)

Optional scope: fix(backend): ..., feat(frontend): ...

Examples:
  fix: correct modbus register byte order
  feat(frontend): add slave configuration wizard
  chore(deps): update angular to 21.2
  feat!: change API response format

COPILOT REVIEW:
  For features/refactorings that need a code review:
  1. Create this PR as DRAFT
  2. Add "copilot" as reviewer
  3. Wait for review comments
  4. Mark as "Ready for review" when done → auto-merge starts
-->
